summary: This is a sealed federal court warrant and order authorizing the FBI to obtain prospective and historical location information, toll records, and pen register data for a cellphone subscribed to 'G Max' (believed to be Ghislaine Maxwell). The document states the investigation is targeting Ghislaine Maxwell and others for suspected violations including conspiracy, sex trafficking, and perjury, and that disclosure could cause flight or witness intimidation.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Named as a subject of an ongoing FBI investigation for suspected violations of federal statutes including conspiracy, sex trafficking of minors, and perjury.

persons.name: G Max
persons.context: The name under which the target cellphone is subscribed; strongly implied to be an alias or reference to Ghislaine Maxwell.

connections.description: The target cellphone is subscribed in the name 'G Max', and the investigation is explicitly targeting Ghislaine Maxwell, indicating this is likely an alias or identifier for her.

events.title: Warrant Issued for Cellphone Tracking
events.description: A U.S. Magistrate Judge issues a sealed warrant authorizing the FBI to track a cellphone subscribed to 'G Max' (Ghislaine Maxwell) for 45 days and obtain historical data back to June 1, 2020.

keyFacts: The FBI obtained a court order on June 30, 2020, to conduct extensive electronic surveillance on a cellphone believed to belong to Ghislaine Maxwell, subscribed under the name 'G Max'.
The investigation targets Ghislaine Maxwell and others for suspected violations of 18 U.S.C. §§ 371 (conspiracy), 2422 (coercion/enticement), 2423(a) (transportation of minors), and 1623 (perjury).
The warrant was sealed due to concerns that notification would result in flight from prosecution, intimidation of witnesses, or jeopardize the investigation.
The order authorized 45 days of prospective location tracking (GPS, cell site) and historical data from June 1, 2020, along with pen register/trap and trace information.
The document reveals an active, covert investigation into Maxwell was underway in mid-2020, prior to her arrest in July 2020.
